ValidationRule.description: For RT Transactional, a synced Quote in Status Sent is required to move to Offer Stage RO-2090
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sales_Transactional", OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName) ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Offer") , NOT(Synced_Quote_Status__c = "Sent") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move to Offer Stage without a sent quote. Please update your Quote to Status "Sent" or select a different Stage.
